title: Qute template extensions throw ambiguous exception on property not found
body:
### Describe the bug

"{time:format(input.birthday, 'uuuu')}" throw IllegalStateException without any meaningful message in case the "birthday" property does not exist.

### Expected behavior

should convey meaningful message similar to what {input.birthday} will throw:

`io.quarkus.qute.TemplateException: Property "birthday" not found on the base object "java.util.ImmutableCollections$Map1" in expression {input.birthday} in template 1 on line 1

	at io.quarkus.qute.TemplateImpl$TemplateInstanceImpl.render(TemplateImpl.java:55)
	at TimeTemplateExtensionsTest.test(TimeTemplateExtensionsTest.java:33)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)

### Actual behavior

`Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
	at io.quarkus.qute.TemplateImpl$TemplateInstanceImpl.render(TemplateImpl.java:60)
	at TimeTemplateExtensionsTest.lambda$throwAmbiguousExceptionOnPropertyNotFound$0(TimeTemplateExtensionsTest.java:23)
	at org.junit.jupiter.api.AssertThrows.assertThrows(AssertThrows.java:55)
	... 74 more
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.timedGet(CompletableFuture.java:1886)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.get(CompletableFuture.java:2021)
	at io.quarkus.qute.TemplateImpl$TemplateInstanceImpl.render(TemplateImpl.java:55)
	... 76 more`

### How to Reproduce?

Please look at the test class TimeTemplateExtensionsTest
[test-quarkus.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7878677/test-quarkus.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus 2.6.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
